steps.title: AM Cleanse and Prep
steps.description: Start with a gentle cleanse and light hydration before daytime protection.

items.name: Gentle Foaming Cleanser
items.context: Use lukewarm water and avoid over-scrubbing.

items.name: Hydrating Toner
items.context: Pat into skin, do not rub aggressively.

steps.title: AM Protect
steps.description: Apply moisturizer and sun protection as the core daytime baseline.

items.name: Broad Spectrum SPF 30+ Sunscreen
items.context: Use enough product and reapply when needed.

items.name: Lip Balm with SPF
items.context: Include lips in daily UV protection.

steps.title: PM Cleanse and Treat
steps.description: Cleanse again in the evening, then add one gentle treatment based on tolerance.

items.name: Niacinamide Serum
items.context: Begin with low frequency and monitor skin response.

steps.title: PM Moisturize and Recover
steps.description: Seal in hydration and support overnight recovery with barrier-friendly products.

items.name: Aloe Gel
items.context: Use as a calming layer if skin feels irritated.

items.name: Clean Pillowcase
items.context: Replace regularly to reduce friction and residue.
